website_summaries.verdict: Simple, sturdy play accessory that is light enough to carry along when taking Baby Alive dolls outside to play.
pros: Nice sized play yard that fits one Baby Alive doll laying down and 2 sitting up
Folds for storage and has its own storage bag
cons: Support locking mechanisms may fail early, making it tough for bassinet to stay up

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this play yard
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this play yard, one end does not stay locked it keeps collapsing causing my 2 year old granddaughter to get frustrated. If not for this issue I think it would be a great play yard.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This - thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Needs to come with a warning label and very poorly constructed
customer_reviews.author: A Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Daughter does not get to use it much because play yard tends to fold on its own making it difficult for her to keep readjusting. Would not buy again. Soon, I will be donating it.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Cute Playyard
customer_reviews.text: Cute little doll bed. My daughter plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves it. She put so many of her other babies in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is better then plastic
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews some say junk some say good, I was impressed, it’s cute, sturdy it allows my granddaughter to fell like she got her own set for her babies, was very happy with it, plus the matching high chair, perfect
customer_reviews.author: heidi jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy! My daughter loves it. It's appears to be extremly sturdy! Something my daughter enjoyed for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Do not waist your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sides keep on collapsing. I read some reviews that mentioned the same problem and I should have listened. DO NOT WAIST YOUR MONEY!!! your child will either get frustrated or hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it and it folds up so she can carry it around as well. Perfect for her playtime.
customer_reviews.author: paul-rhonda crow

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received this very quickly and I know my daughter is going to love it when she opens it on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Barrinisha bush

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Junky!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas. VERY disappointed. Keeps collapsing and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Hassanzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Baby Alive playpen was a little smaller than I anticipated but my granddaughter plays with it..
customer_reviews.author: BTUCKER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Very cute. My grand-daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory For Playing Babies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 1/2 and loves to play babies. This play yard has given her the opportunity to add a new dimension to her play. She loves changing her baby on the top bassinet/changing table as well as put them to bed in the bottom of the crib. I love that it comes with a carrying/storage bag that perfect for when not in use or travel. It's easy to set up and take down and fairly sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: 4649miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas and it did not last long. The legs wont stay up and it keeps falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Deeds

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our playroom!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this play yard! Our daughter loves to play pretend with her babies and dolls and this is pefect for her. She has fun putting them to sleep in here and pretending to change them. We like that it rolls easily and can be stored easily in the carrying case for travel or storage. The colors are fun and bright. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this playpen
customer_reviews.text: We love this playpen! My daughter loves to put her dollies to sleep in here and also has parties in here for all her stuffed animals. It was not hard to put together and is nice and sturdy for the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Doll Play Yard Toy
product_meta.description: Your baby alive and other baby dolls will love this perfect fashionable play yard. It's for the trendiest little mommies. When assembled the play yard is 19.3 x 11.8 x 15.7". the play yard can be easily folded for travels and storage.
feature_bullets: Fold like a real play yard for easy storage and travel

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
